name: Advance Wars Web
description:
Easy to Play: AWBW is free, works entirely within the browser, and requires no downloads
Up to 16 Players: Play 1 vs. 1, on a team, or in a free-for-all with up to 15 other players
New Armies: 11 custom armies are available to play in addition to the original 5
All 28 Commanding Officers: Play as any CO from Advance Wars 1, 2, or DS
Custom Design Maps: Search our library of thousands of user-created maps, or design your own
Competitions: Play competitively in the Global League ladder or participate in regular tournaments
